Name: BVRGER VAN
About the game: BVRGER VAN is a frantic and fast-paced Virtual Reality game where you are tasked with the upkeep of your burger van business. Cook burgers, hotdogs, and much more as you journey your way to becoming the best burger van in town! Features: Fast-Paced action - There is never a dull moment in the burger van as the impatient customers don't stop coming! Career mode - Start from the bottom and in debt as you fight for customers to keep that money rolling in! Infinite mode - Earn money and buy upgrades in this never-ending challenge to achieve the high score and earn those burger bragging rights Simple controls - With easy to learn controls, even those inexperienced with VR can enjoy the game Non-stop fun - Randomised orders and increasing difficulty make BVRGER VAN an enjoyable game that just keeps on giving! About: You are the owner of your very own burger van where you can cook and serve food in amazing Virtual Reality compatible with both HTC Vive and Oculus Rift w/ Touch. Simple controls make BVRGER VAN a great game for VR veterans as well as a great starting platform for the VR newbies. Compete with friends to obtain the high score or battle yourself and see how long you can last. Create your own journey in your path the burger van glory. Just remember, keep on flippin'!
